# Coralie Beauté - Vue.js Project

## Project Overview
Single-page application for Coralie Beauté, an at-home beautician service in Dax, France.

## Tech Stack
- Vue.js 3
- Vite
- TailwindCSS
- DaisyUI

## Project Structure
- Single-page application with sections: Services, Personal Presentation, Prices
- Cream/pink color palette
- Responsive design
- Static build output for custom web server deployment

## Build Instructions
- Development: `npm run dev`
- Production build: `npm run build`
- Preview build: `npm run preview`
